movies.title: Pettson and Findus: A Little Nuisance, a Great Friendship
movies.originalTitle: Pettersson und Findus - Kleiner Quälgeist, große Freundschaft
movies.plot: In search of a home young bold tomcat Findus finds shelter at the farmyard of old Pettersson, breaking the silence of the old man's lonely life once and for all. It's the beginning of a wonderful friendship. First Live-Action Movie with animated cat based on the bestselling children's book series Pettersson and Findus written by Sven Nordqvist.
movies.simplePlot: The adventures of a grumpy old farmer and his cat.

biography.bio: Ulrich Noethen was born on November 18, 1959 in Munich, Germany as Ulrich Schmidt. He is an actor, known for Downfall (2004), The Harmonists (1997) and The Flying Classroom (2003). He was previously married to Friederike Wagner.
biography.name: Ulrich Noethen

biography.bio: Marianne Sägebrecht, aka, "mother of Munich's sub-culture", a name that was dubbed to her while she was working as a producer and performer in avant garde theater productions, was discovered by Percy Adlon in 1977. The director gave her a minor part in his feature "The Swing" before he gave her the leading role of Marianne, a mortician, in Zuckerbaby (1985). Followed by the leading role of Jasmin Münchgstettner, a woman who mysteriously appears just to bring luminosity to the old, beaten down, and spiritually deprived Bagdad Café in, Bagdad Cafe (1987). Her performance in the film garnered a German Film Award.
biography.name: Marianne Sägebrecht

biography.bio: Max Herbrechter was born on March 12, 1958 in Dortmund, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany. He is an actor, known for Rochade (1997), Gran Paradiso (2000) and Bermuda Triangle North Sea (2011).
biography.name: Max Herbrechter

biography.bio: Roxana Samadi is an actress, known for Pettson and Findus: A Little Nuisance, a Great Friendship (2014) and Dr. Illegal (2015).
biography.name: Roxana Samadi

biography.bio: Caroline Schreiber was born in 1962 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany. She is an actress, known for La falaise (2002), Salami Aleikum (2009) and Snowland (2005).
biography.name: Caroline Schreiber

biography.bio: Ali Samadi Ahadi is a director and writer, known for Salami Aleikum (2009), The Green Wave (2010) and Lost Children (2005).
biography.name: Ali Samadi Ahadi

biography.bio: Ali N. Askin was born in 1962 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He is known for his work on Family Mix (2006), Le secret de Chanda (2010) and Offside (2005).
biography.name: Ali N. Askin

biography.bio: Lilian-Maria is an actress, known for Pettson and Findus: A Little Nuisance, a Great Friendship (2014).
biography.name: Lilian-Maria

biography.bio: Kristiina Tuomi is an actress, known for Pettson and Findus: A Little Nuisance, a Great Friendship (2014).
biography.name: Kristiina Tuomi

biography.bio: Navid was born in Teheran, Iran. Due to the Iran-Iraq war the four-year old Navid had to escape with his family from his native country. They lived for some time in the USA but since 1985 Navid has been in Germany at home. Navid has grown up trilingual (English, German, Persian). He was 8 years old when he stepped foot on a stage for the 1st time. He has played famous literature characters in different theater plays e.g. the part of "Lady Macbeth" in William Shakespeare's "Macbeth" & "Romeo" in "Romeo and Juliet". Navid has also worked on several TV & film-productions during and over this time. During 2003 Navid earned a nomination in the category "Best Actor in a Leading Role" for his performance in "Fremder Freund" (a.k.a. "The Friend"), for the "Förderpreis Deutscher Film". "Fremder Freund" (directed by Elmar Fischer) has won several prizes at International Film Festivals. More award wining movies Navid played leading roles in: "For a Moment Freedom" (directed by Arash T. Riahi) counts over 25 prizes at several international film festivals and was the Austrian entry for the Oscars in 2010. "Salami Aleikum" (directed by Ali Samadi Ahadi) won the main award and the audience award at the film festival in Emden Nordeney. "Match Factor" (directed by Mahin Zia) has won during the Berlin Film Festival 2008. "Fremde Haut" (directed by Angelina Maccarrone) & "Anam" (directed by Buket Alakus) are also winners of international film festivals. Navid is also a director who has directed over 20 music videos and one short film called "Empty" starring Mina Tander. On Valentines Day 2014 he released the music video "Behesht" (meaning: Paradise) for the legendary Persian singer Googoosh. In March 2014 Navid changed his stage name from Navid Akhavan to Navid Navid.
biography.name: Navid Navid

biography.bio: Melika Foroutan was born in 1976 in Teheran, Iran. She is an actress, known for Berlin, brigade criminelle (2007), Die dunkle Seite (2008) and Begierde - Mord im Zeichen des Zen (2015).
biography.name: Melika Foroutan

filmingLocations.location: MMC Studios, Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany
